data.prayer: Lord, use Google search to lead people in Võru, Estonia to the gospel today.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Võru, Estonia
data.section_summary: What challenges do people here face?

data.prayer: Father, reveal yourself to a faithful non-believer today, someone like Cornelius, and then Father please connect him with the church in Võru, Estonia.
data.verse: Cornelius answered: “Three days ago I was in my house praying at this hour, at three in the afternoon. Suddenly a man in shining clothes stood before me and said, ‘Cornelius, God has heard your prayer and remembered your gifts to the poor."

data.prayer: Lord, please provide elders whose hearts are completely yours in every town in the state of Võru.
data.verse: The reason I left you in Crete was that you might put in order what was left unfinished and appoint elders in every town, as I directed you.

data.prayer: Jesus, all authority was given to you, and you commanded all disciples in Võru, Estonia to make more disciples, and you promised to be with them. May your power and their obedience make more disciples today.
data.verse: All authority in heaven and on earth has been given to me. Therefore go and make disciples of all nations, baptizing them in the name of the Father and of the Son and of the Holy Spirit, and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you. And surely I am with you always, to the very end of the age.

data.prayer: Father, let knowledge and depth of insight abound more and more in the church of Võru, Estonia.
data.verse: And this is my prayer: that your love may abound more and more in knowledge and depth of insight,

data.prayer: Jesus, please give the apostles in Võru, Estonia a vision for the harvest, and a passion to see the gospel spread to every corner of the the state.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.section_summary:
the state of Võru, Estonia has a population of 34,900.

We estimate Võru has 1,637 people who might know Jesus, 14,914 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 18,349 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 21 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Spirit, help the church in the state of Võru do things that will multiply their numbers, not just add to them.
data.verse: But thanks be to God, who always leads us triumphantly as captives in Christ and through us spreads everywhere the fragrance of the knowledge of Him.
